name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
notes: The archive at gamesnostalgia.com already contains the ScummVM runner (which we will not use). The game data will end up at $GAMEDIR/indy3. Keep that in mind in case you need to update the installation script.
content:
files:
- archive: http://cdn.gamesnostalgia.com/files/f/p/fpj406273185l90903017128/indycrusade_scumm_win.7z
game:
  game_id: indy3
  path: $GAMEDIR/indy3
installer:
- extract:
    file: archive
